instruction: Create a resume for a customer service representative.
output:
Rebecca Smith
Toronto, ON

Objective
To work as a customer service representative and utilize my excellent problem-solving, communication, and interpersonal skills to provide the best possible customer experience.

Skills
• Outstanding communication and conflict resolution skills 
• Strong phone etiquette, customer service, and computer skills 
• Ability to learn new systems quickly 
• Ability to stay calm in stressful situations 
• Pleasant and professional demeanor

Experience 
Customer Service Representative (2019-Present)
McDonalds, Toronto 
• Responded promptly and courteously to customer requests and inquiries 
• Resolved customer issues in a timely manner, while striving to meet company expectations 
• Maintained a good working relationship with customers and colleagues 
• Performed administrative tasks such as taking messages, directing calls, and filing documents

Education
High School Diploma, 2017
St. John’s High School, Toronto
